trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the contents of the control to the current caret position.
trans-unit.target: Ruller innholdet i kontrollen dit gjeldende synlig.

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to scroll the contents of the control until the caret is within the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig å rulle innholdet i kontrollen før synlig er innenfor området som er synlig for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If the caret is positioned below the visible region of the control, the ScrollToCaret method will scroll the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis synlig er plassert under synlige område kontrollens, rulle metoden ScrollToCaret innholdet i kontrollen før synlig vises nederst i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If the caret is positioned above the visible region of the control, this method scrolls the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the top of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis synlig er plassert over synlige område kontrollens, ruller denne metoden innholdet i kontrollen før synlig vises øverst i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method in a multiline text box to ensure that the current text entry point is within the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden i tekstbokser med å sikre at gjeldende tekst inngangspunktet er innenfor det synlige området for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method has no effect if the control does not have focus or if the caret is already positioned in the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden har ingen virkning hvis kontrollen ikke har fokus, eller hvis synlig er allerede plassert i synlige området for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Selects a range of text in the text box.
trans-unit.target: Velg et område med tekst i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the start position to the first character in the control's text, set the `start` parameter to 0.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi startposisjonen til det første tegnet i teksten i kontroll, angi den `start` parameteren til 0.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to select a substring of text, such as when searching through the text of the control and replacing information.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å velge en delstrengen i teksten, for eksempel når søke gjennom teksten kontrollens og erstatte informasjon.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the `start` parameter to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the `length` parameter to a value of zero (0).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan flytte synlig i tekstboksen programmatisk ved å angi den `start` parameter posisjonen i tekstboksen der du vil synlig til å flytte til og angi den `length` parameteren verdien null (0).

trans-unit.source: The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved.
trans-unit.target: Tekstboksen må ha fokus for at synlig flyttes.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If this method is called without any parameters, an alternative method is used.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis denne metoden kalles uten parametere, en alternativ metode brukes.

trans-unit.source: This alternative method inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne alternativ metode arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: When called, it sets the input focus to the control and selects the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: Når kalt, angir inndata fokus til kontrollen, og merker innholdet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The position of the first character in the current text selection within the text box.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen til det første tegnet i den gjeldende merkede teksten i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to select.
trans-unit.target: Antallet tegn du velger.

trans-unit.source: The value of the start parameter is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den start parameteren er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Selects all text in the text box.
trans-unit.target: Velg all tekst i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to select all text within the control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan du velge all tekst i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Cut%2A> method, which requires text to be selected in the control, to cut the entire contents of the control and paste them into the **Clipboard**.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden sammen med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Cut%2A>metode, som krever tekst i kontrollen for å klippe ut hele innholdet i kontrollen og lime dem inn i **utklippstavlen**.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Cut%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the currently selected text in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir den merkede teksten i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can assign text to this property to change the text currently selected in the text box.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilordne tekst for denne egenskapen til å endre teksten som er valgt i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: If no text is currently selected in the text box, this property returns a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen tekst er valgt i tekstboksen, returnerer egenskapen en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the currently selected text in the text box.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer den merkede teksten i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of characters selected in the text box.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antallet tegn som er valgt i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine if any characters are currently selected in the text box control before performing operations on the selected text.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å fastslå om tegn er for øyeblikket er valgt i tekstboks før du kan utføre operasjoner på den merkede teksten.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the SelectionLength property is set to a value that is larger than the number of characters within the text of the control, the value of the SelectionLength property is set to the entire length of text within the control minus the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A> property (if any value is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Når verdien for egenskapen SelectionLength er satt til en verdi som er større enn antallet tegn i teksten i kontrollen, verdien for egenskapen SelectionLength er satt til hele lengden på teksten i kontrollen minus verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A>egenskapen (Hvis ingen verdi er angitt for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A>egenskapen).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A> to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the SelectionLength property to a value of zero (0).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan flytte synlig i tekstboksen programmatisk ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A>dit i tekstboksen der du vil synlig å flytte til og egenskapen SelectionLength til verdien null (0).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved.
trans-unit.target: Tekstboksen må ha fokus for at synlig flyttes.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters selected in the text box.
trans-unit.target: Antallet tegn som er valgt i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Tilordnet verdien er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting point of text selected in the text box.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir startpunktet for merkede teksten i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point, or caret, for new text.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen tekst er valgt i kontrollen, angir egenskapen innsettingspunktet eller synlig for ny tekst.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position will be placed after the last character.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne egenskapen til en plassering utenfor lengden på teksten i kontrollen, vil bli plassert startposisjonen valg etter det siste tegnet.

trans-unit.source: When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property might decrease the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis teksten er i tekstboks, endrer denne egenskapen kan redusere verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the SelectionStart property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> property is automatically decreased.
trans-unit.target: Hvis resten av teksten i kontrollen etter plasseringen angitt av egenskapen SelectionStart er mindre enn verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>egenskapen, verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>egenskapen automatisk reduseres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the SelectionStart property never causes an increase in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen SelectionStart aldri forårsaker en økning i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically move the selection within the text box by setting the SelectionStart and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan flytte utvalget programmatisk i tekstboksen ved å angi SelectionStart og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the SelectionStart to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> property to a value of zero (0).
trans-unit.target: Du kan flytte synlig i tekstboksen programmatisk ved å angi SelectionStart posisjonen i tekstboksen der du vil synlig til å flytte til og angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>egenskapen verdien null (0).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> must have focus in order for the selection or the caret to be moved.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>må ha fokus for at utvalget eller synlig flyttes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can set the SelectionStart property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> by giving it the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> first.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen SelectionStart for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>ved å gi det i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>første.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The starting position of text selected in the text box.
trans-unit.target: Startposisjonen for merkede teksten i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Tilordnet verdien er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir de angitte grensene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> control uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.PreferredHeight%2A> property to set the bounds if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AutoSize%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>kontrollere bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.PreferredHeight%2A>til å angi grensene Hvis det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AutoSize%2A>egenskapen `true` og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.PreferredHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the `specified` parameter are passed in with their current values.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis parameterne som tilsvarer grensene ikke er inkludert i den `specified` -parameteren sendt med gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, or the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, eller <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>eller <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>egenskapene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>egenskapen kan sendes i en referanse til den gjeldende forekomsten av kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: However all values passed in are honored and applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: Alle verdier som er sendt inn er imidlertid innfridd og brukes til kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The `specified` parameter represents the elements of the controls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A> changed by your application.
trans-unit.target: Den `specified` parameteren representerer elementer vises <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>endret av programmet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control, the `specified` parameter value is the `Size` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du endrer det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>kontrollens, i `specified` parameterverdien er det `Size` verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> is adjusted in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property being set, the `specified` parameter value is the `None` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>justeres som svar på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>egenskapen, den `specified` parameterverdien er den `None` verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: Ikke brukt.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the defined shortcuts are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om de definerte snarveiene er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShortcutsEnabled property to enable or disable the following shortcut key combinations and the control’s shortcut menu: - CTRL+Z - CTRL+E - CTRL+C - CTRL+Y - CTRL+X - CTRL+BACKSPACE - CTRL+V - CTRL+DELETE - CTRL+A - SHIFT+DELETE - CTRL+L - SHIFT+INSERT - CTRL+R You can override this property to specify other shortcut keys.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ShortcutsEnabled-egenskapen for å aktivere eller deaktivere følgende snarvei key kombinasjoner og kontrollens hurtigmenyen: - CTRL + Z - CTRL + E - CTRL + C - CTRL + Y - CTRL + X - CTRL + tilbake - CTRL + V - CTRL + Slett - CTRL + A - SKIFT + DELETE - CTRL + L - SKIFT + INSERT - CTRL + R du kan overstyre denne egenskapen for å angi andre hurtigtaster.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable the shortcuts; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>aktivere snarveier; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current text in the text box.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den gjeldende teksten i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: To display multiple lines of text in a text box, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å vise flere linjer med tekst i en tekstboks, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>

trans-unit.source: To read or set the text of a multiline text box, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Lines%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å lese eller angi tekst for tekstbokser, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Lines%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Lines%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount of text that can be entered in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control is limited only by available system memory.
trans-unit.target: Mengden som kan angis i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>kontrollen er bare begrenset av tilgjengelig systemminne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of text in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter lengden på teksten i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the number of characters in a string for tasks such as searching for specific strings of text within the text of the control, where knowledge of the total number of characters is needed.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å bestemme antall tegn i en streng for oppgaver som søker etter bestemte tekststrenger i teksten i kontrollen, der kunnskap om antall tegn er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters contained in the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: Antallet tegn i teksten i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som representerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The string includes the type and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase"></xref> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som inneholder typen og <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase"> </xref> -egenskapen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Undoes the last edit operation in the text box.
trans-unit.target: Angrar siste redigeringsoperasjonen i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: This method will undo the last **Clipboard** or text change operation performed in the text box control if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.CanUndo%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden vil angre siste **utklippstavlen** eller teksten endre operasjon utføres i tekstboks hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.CanUndo%2A>returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.CanUndo%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Undo method does not work with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I Angre metoden fungerer ikke med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Behandler Windows meldinger.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> prosessen.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a multiline text box control automatically wraps words to the beginning of the next line when necessary.
trans-unit.target: Angir om en flere linjer tekstbokskontroll automatisk brytes ord til starten av den neste linjen når det er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, horizontal scroll bars are not displayed regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `true`, vannrett Rull stolper vises ikke uavhengig av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A>egenskapsinnstillingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, text within the control will always wrap regardless of the property setting of this property unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A> property is set to `HorizontalAlignment.Left`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I den utledede klassen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, tekst i kontrollen brytes alltid uavhengig av egenskapsinnstillingen for denne egenskapen med mindre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A>er satt til `HorizontalAlignment.Left`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the multiline text box control wraps words; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the text box control automatically scrolls horizontally when the user types past the right edge of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis flere linjer tekstboks bryter ordene. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis tekstboks ruller automatisk vannrett når brukeren skriver forbi høyre kant av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
